document.full_text: taiwanese smartphone maker htc unveiled on tuesday a new handset model that offers a library of movies and tv shows via a wide screen that will be available on the vodafone network.
document.title: htc to launch new video service phone on vodafone
lines_and_colors: taiwanese smartphone maker htc unveiled on tuesday a new handset model that offers a library of movies and tv shows via a wide screen that will be available on the vodafone network.
